page.title: 18 The old. Policing
page.content: {banks in Peterborough.Others go to {Stamford,Oundle,Wellingborough,and {even Nottingham. { There are no provisions for the old {partly because there are only 3 {elderly people in the area and they {have relatives or friends living near {by to take care of them. { To take care of maintaining the Law {the people in our block have to rely {upon the constabulary of Castor.There {used to be a Policeman who visited {Upton regularly but,as is sadly true {of many places,there is no longer a {patroling Police Constable. }
